title: Bridging the centuries
creator_credit: Royal Doulton, World Wide and John Patterson Reid
brief_description: Traces the history of pottery making in Britain from neolithic times to the present day. Examples of rare English pottery and china from different centuries are shown. Illustrates the influence of Chinese work on the development of English bone china. Describes the evolution of English translucent china particularly for tableware.
